document.full_text: a syrian site bombed by israel in 2007 was "very likely" to have been a nuclear reactor which should have been declared, the u.n. atomic agency said in a report, an assertion which may lead to damascus being referred to the u.n. security council.
document.title: syria site was "very likely" an atom reactor: iaea
lines_and_colors: a syrian site bombed by israel in 2007 was "very likely" to have been a nuclear reactor which should have been declared, the u.n. atomic agency said in a report, an assertion which may lead to damascus being referred to the u.n. security council.
